pullrequest.title: Plotting: Highlight search terms and make it behave like a filter

content.raw: You could declare two fonts, one regular and one bold, outside of this loop. I think you could effectively move lines 215-217, 223, 239-241, 247 outside this loop. The advantage is that the loop will be easier to read, and the number of function calls will be slightly reduced.
content.html: You could declare two fonts, one regular and one bold, outside of this loop. I think you could effectively move lines 215-217, 223, 239-241, 247 outside this loop. The advantage is that the loop will be easier to read, and the number of function calls will be slightly reduced.
